#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
#define test(t) while(t--)

typedef long long int ll;
ll Count[100001][400];
ll sum;

void precompute()
{
	ll i, j, k;
	for(i=1;i<400;i++)
		Count[0][i]=1;
	for(i=1;i<=100000;i++)
	{
		for(j=1;j<400;j++)
			Count[i][j]=((Count[i][j-1])%MOD+(Count[i-1][j])%MOD)%MOD;
	}
}


int main()
{
	ll t, n, k, i, j, x, root;
	for(i=0;i<100001;i++)
	{
		for(j=0;j<400;j++)
			Count[i][j]=0;
	}
	precompute();
	cin>>t;
	test(t)
	{
		cin>>n>>k;
		sum=0;
		if(n==1)
			cout<<"-1"<<endl;
		else
		{	
		root=sqrt(k);
		for(x=1; x<=root; x++)
			sum=(sum+((Count[n-2][x])*((k/x-x+1)%MOD)))%MOD;
		cout<<sum<<endl;	
		}
			
	}
	return 0;
}
